name: Program wise Fee Collection
query:
SELECT 
    FeesCollected.program AS "Program:Link/Program:200",
    FeesCollected.paid_amount AS "Fees Collected:Currency:150",
    FeesCollected.outstanding_amount AS "Outstanding Amount:Currency:150",
    FeesCollected.grand_total "Grand Total:Currency:150"
FROM (
    SELECT 
        sum(grand_total) - sum(outstanding_amount) AS paid_amount, program,
        sum(outstanding_amount) AS outstanding_amount,
        sum(grand_total) AS grand_total
    FROM `tabFees`
    WHERE docstatus = 1
    GROUP BY program
) AS FeesCollected
ORDER BY FeesCollected.paid_amount DESC
